verses.verse: וַיַּ֥עַן <WH6030> answered אִיּ֗וֹב <WH347> Then Job וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <WH559> and said

אָ֭מְנָם <WH551> [it is] so of a truth יָדַ֣עְתִּי <WH3045> I know כִי־ <WH3588> for כֵ֑ן <WH3651> is so וּמַה־ <WH4100> how יִּצְדַּ֖ק <WH6663> be just אֱנ֣וֹשׁ <WH582> but how should man עִם־ <WH5973> before אֵֽל׃ <WH410> God

אִם־ <WH518> If יַ֭חְפֹּץ <WH2654> If he will לָרִ֣יב <WH7378> contend עִמּ֑וֹ <WH5973> with לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יַ֝עֲנֶ֗נּוּ <WH6030> with him he cannot answer אַחַ֥ת <WH259> him one מִנִּי־ <WH4480> in אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> of a thousand

חֲכַ֣ם <WH2450> [He is] wise לֵ֭בָב <WH3824> in heart וְאַמִּ֣יץ <WH533> and mighty כֹּ֑חַ <WH3581> in strength מִֽי־ <WH4310> Who הִקְשָׁ֥ה <WH7185> who hath hardened אֵ֝לָ֗יו <WH413> about וַיִּשְׁלָֽם׃ <WH7999> [himself] against him and hath prospered

הַמַּעְתִּ֣יק <WH6275> Which removeth הָ֭רִים <WH2022> the mountains וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not יָדָ֑עוּ <WH3045> and they know אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> not When הֲפָכָ֣ם <WH2015> not which overturneth בְּאַפּֽוֹ׃ <WH639> them in his anger
הַמַּרְגִּ֣יז <WH7264> Which shaketh אֶ֭רֶץ <WH776> the earth מִמְּקוֹמָ֑הּ <WH4725> out of her place וְ֝עַמּוּדֶ֗יהָ <WH5982> and the pillars יִתְפַלָּצֽוּן׃ <WH6426> thereof tremble

הָאֹמֵ֣ר <WH559> Which commandeth לַ֭חֶרֶס <WH2775> the sun וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not יִזְרָ֑ח <WH2224> and it riseth וּבְעַ֖ד <WH1157> upon כּוֹכָבִ֣ים <WH3556> the stars יַחְתֹּֽם׃ <WH2856> not and sealeth up

נֹטֶ֣ה <WH5186> Which alone spreadeth out שָׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> the heavens לְבַדּ֑וֹ <WH905> alone וְ֝דוֹרֵ֗ךְ <WH1869> and treadeth עַל־ <WH5921> and בָּ֥מֳתֵי <WH1116> upon the waves יָֽם׃ <WH3220> of the sea
עֹֽשֶׂה־ <WH6213> Which maketh עָ֭שׁ <WH5906> Arcturus כְּסִ֥יל <WH3685> Orion וְכִימָ֗ה <WH3598> and Pleiades וְחַדְרֵ֥י <WH2315> and the chambers תֵמָֽן׃ <WH8486> of the south

עֹשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> Which doeth גְ֭דֹלוֹת <WH1419> great things עַד־ <WH5704> against אֵ֣ין <WH369> past חֵ֑קֶר <WH2714> finding out וְנִפְלָא֗וֹת <WH6381> yea and wonders עַד־ <WH5704> against אֵ֥ין <WH369> else מִסְפָּֽר׃ <WH4557> without number

הֵ֤ן <WH2005> behold יַעֲבֹ֣ר <WH5674> Lo he goeth עָ֭לַי <WH5921> and וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not אֶרְאֶ֑ה <WH7200> by me and I see וְ֝יַחֲלֹ֗ף <WH2498> [him] not he passeth on וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> not אָבִ֥ין <WH995> also but I perceive לֽוֹ׃

הֵ֣ן <WH2005> behold יַ֭חְתֹּף <WH2862> Behold he taketh away מִ֣י <WH4310> who יְשִׁיבֶ֑נּוּ <WH7725> who can hinder מִֽי־ <WH4310> Who יֹאמַ֥ר <WH559> him? who will say אֵ֝לָ֗יו <WH413> to him מַֽה־ <WH4100> What תַּעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> unto him What doest

אֱ֭לוֹהַּ <WH433> [If] God לֹא־ <WH3808> will not יָשִׁ֣יב <WH7725> will not withdraw אַפּ֑וֹ <WH639> his anger [תַּחַתֹו כ] (תַּחְתָּ֥יו <WH8478> Thahash ק) שָׁ֝חֲח֗וּ <WH7817> do stoop עֹ֣זְרֵי <WH5826> helpers רָֽהַב׃ <WH7293> the proud
אַ֭ף <WH637> How כִּֽי־ <WH3588> can אָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> I אֶֽעֱנֶ֑נּוּ <WH6030> How much less shall I answer אֶבְחֲרָ֖ה <WH977> him [and] choose out דְבָרַ֣י <WH1697> my words עִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5973> before

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after אִם־ <WH518> though צָ֭דַקְתִּי <WH6663> Whom though I were righteous לֹ֣א <WH3808> not אֶעֱנֶ֑ה <WH6030> [yet] would I not answer לִ֝מְשֹׁפְטִ֗י <WH8199> to my judge אֶתְחַנָּֽן׃ <WH2603> [but] I would make supplication

אִם־ <WH518> If קָרָ֥אתִי <WH7121> If I had called וַֽיַּעֲנֵ֑נִי <WH6030> and he had answered לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not אַ֝אֲמִ֗ין <WH539> me [yet] would I not believe כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יַאֲזִ֥ין <WH238> that he had hearkened קוֹלִֽי׃ <WH6963> unto my voice
אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> me בִּשְׂעָרָ֥ה <WH8183> me with a tempest יְשׁוּפֵ֑נִי <WH7779> For he breaketh וְהִרְבָּ֖ה <WH7235> and multiplieth פְצָעַ֣י <WH6482> my wounds חִנָּֽם׃ <WH2600> without cause

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> He will not יִ֭תְּנֵנִי <WH5414> He will not suffer הָשֵׁ֣ב <WH7725> me to take רוּחִ֑י <WH7307> my breath כִּ֥י <WH3588> But יַ֝שְׂבִּעַ֗נִי <WH7646> but filleth מַמְּרֹרִֽים׃ <WH4472> me with bitterness

אִם־ <WH518> If לְכֹ֣חַ <WH3581> If [I speak] of strength אַמִּ֣יץ <WH533> lo [he is] strong הִנֵּ֑ה <WH2009> behold וְאִם־ <WH518> and if לְ֝מִשְׁפָּ֗ט <WH4941> and if of judgment מִ֣י <WH4310> who יוֹעִידֵֽנִי׃ <WH3259> who shall set

אִם־ <WH518> Though אֶ֭צְדָּק <WH6663> If I justify פִּ֣י <WH6310> myself mine own mouth יַרְשִׁיעֵ֑נִי <WH7561> shall condemn תָּֽם־ <WH8535> me [if I say] I [am] perfect אָ֝֗נִי <WH589> I וַֽיַּעְקְשֵֽׁנִי׃ <WH6140> it shall also prove me perverse

תָּֽם־ <WH8535> [Though] I [were] perfect אָ֭נִי <WH589> I לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not אֵדַ֥ע <WH3045> [yet] would I not know נַפְשִׁ֗י <WH5315> my soul אֶמְאַ֥ס <WH3988> I would despise חַיָּֽי׃ <WH2416> my life

אַחַ֗ת <WH259> This [is] one הִ֥יא <WH1931> he עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> after that אָמַ֑רְתִּי <WH559> [thing] therefore I said תָּ֥ם <WH8535> the perfect וְ֝רָשָׁ֗ע <WH7563> and the wicked ה֣וּא <WH1931> He מְכַלֶּֽה׃ <WH3615> [it] He destroyeth
אִם־ <WH518> If שׁ֭וֹט <WH7752> If the scourge יָמִ֣ית <WH4191> slay פִּתְאֹ֑ם <WH6597> suddenly לְמַסַּ֖ת <WH4531> at the trial נְקִיִּ֣ם <WH5355> of the innocent יִלְעָֽג׃ <WH3932> he will laugh

אֶ֤רֶץ ׀ <WH776> The earth נִתְּנָ֬ה <WH5414> is given בְֽיַד־ <WH3027> into the hand רָשָׁ֗ע <WH7563> of the wicked פְּנֵֽי־ <WH6440> the faces שֹׁפְטֶ֥יהָ <WH8199> of the judges יְכַסֶּ֑ה <WH3680> he covereth אִם־ <WH518> If לֹ֖א <WH3808> before אֵפ֣וֹא <WH645> thereof if not where מִי־ <WH4310> who הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וְיָמַ֣י <WH3117> Now my days קַ֭לּוּ <WH7043> are swifter מִנִּי־ <WH4480> than רָ֑ץ <WH7323> than a post בָּֽ֝רְח֗וּ <WH1272> they flee away לֹא־ <WH3808> no רָא֥וּ <WH7200> they see טוֹבָֽה׃ <WH2896> no good

חָ֭לְפוּ <WH2498> They are passed away עִם־ <WH5973> as אֳנִיּ֣וֹת <WH591> ships אֵבֶ֑ה <WH16> the swift כְּ֝נֶ֗שֶׁר <WH5404> as the eagle יָט֥וּשׂ <WH2907> [that] hasteth עֲלֵי־ <WH5921> on אֹֽכֶל׃ <WH400> to the prey

אִם־ <WH518> Though אָ֭מְרִי <WH559> If I say אֶשְׁכְּחָ֣ה <WH7911> I will forget שִׂיחִ֑י <WH7879> my complaint אֶעֶזְבָ֖ה <WH5800> I will leave off פָנַ֣י <WH6440> my heaviness וְאַבְלִֽיגָה׃ <WH1082> and comfort

יָגֹ֥רְתִּי <WH3025> I am afraid כָל־ <WH3605> of all עַצְּבֹתָ֑י <WH6094> of all my sorrows יָ֝דַ֗עְתִּי <WH3045> I know כִּי־ <WH3588> for לֹ֥א <WH3808> you will not תְנַקֵּֽנִי׃ <WH5352> that thou wilt not hold me innocent
אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> I אֶרְשָׁ֑ע <WH7561> [If] I be wicked לָמָּה־ <WH4100> Why זֶּ֝֗ה <WH2088> then הֶ֣בֶל <WH1892> altogether אִיגָֽע׃ <WH3021> why then labour
אִם־ <WH518> If הִתְרָחַ֥צְתִּי <WH7364> If I wash [בְמֹו כ] (בְמֵי־ שָׁ֑לֶג <WH4325> waste ק) וַ֝הֲזִכּ֗וֹתִי <WH2141> so clean בְּבֹ֣ר <WH1253> lye כַּפָּֽי׃ <WH3709> and make my hands

אָ֭ז <WH227> Yet בַּשַּׁ֣חַת <WH7845> me in the ditch תִּטְבְּלֵ֑נִי <WH2881> shalt thou plunge וְ֝תִֽעֲב֗וּנִי <WH8581> shall abhor שַׂלְמוֹתָֽי׃ <WH8008> and mine own clothes כִּי־ <WH3588> for לֹא־ <WH3808> not

אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> For [he is] not a man כָּמֹ֣נִי <WH3644> I אֶֽעֱנֶ֑נּוּ <WH6030> as I [am that] I should answer נָב֥וֹא <WH935> him [and] we should come יַ֝חְדָּ֗ו <WH3162> together בַּמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> in judgment

לֹ֣א <WH3863> if יֵשׁ־ <WH3426> Neither is בֵּינֵ֣ינוּ <WH996> between מוֹכִ֑יחַ <WH3198> there any daysman יָשֵׁ֖ת <WH7896> betwixt us [that] might lay יָד֣וֹ <WH3027> his hand עַל־ <WH5921> upon שְׁנֵֽינוּ׃ <WH8147> upon us both
יָסֵ֣ר <WH5493> away מֵעָלַ֣י <WH5921> and שִׁבְט֑וֹ <WH7626> his rod וְ֝אֵמָת֗וֹ <WH367> from me and let not his fear אַֽל־ <WH408> nay תְּבַעֲתַֽנִּי׃ <WH1204> terrify

אַֽ֭דַבְּרָה <WH1696> [Then] would I speak וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and not אִירָאֶ֑נּוּ <WH3372> and not fear כִּ֥י <WH3588> for לֹא־ <WH3808> I am not כֵ֥ן <WH3651> like אָ֝נֹכִ֗י <WH595> I עִמָּדִֽי׃ <WH5978> against
